App may not show the ad immediately upon opening. In my case after minimising it & using any other app for 30 secs and then maximising the Terabox app again will show the ad. > Updating your filters seems to remove the ad maybe once but when the app is opened again after closing (using greenify) you can see the ad after a few seconds. ### Screenshots
